answers.answer: Mine was big for a first baby. My best friend had a small baby. He was 6lbs. Every baby is different.  This pregnancy at 25wks my baby already weighed 2 lbs 1oz.  My 1st was 8lbs 9 1/2oz.

With my 1st pregnancy i was always eating and drinking soda. My daughter weighed 8lb 14oz but she was little. Newborn clothes were big on her. And now my 2nd little girl weighs 7 pounds and im only 36 weeks. But it does only depend on your baby. Goodluck :)

I've been eating like crazy also. But I don't think it has to do much wih how much we eat. My sister had a horrible belly with her third that's now four months and she was hardly able to eat. Yet the baby was almost 10lbs.

Yeah i lost 25 pounds the first 5 months of this pregnancy and i thought my baby wouldnt get what i was eating but she was. And ive gained back 15 of that 25. I dont eat much because i started getting sick again and my baby is still a fatty. You can eat all day long and all night lol but some people are different.
My first pregnancy I didn't have an appetite the whole time, didn't even gain any weight and my son was still 10.1lbs. Anything could happen js
.  Im 16 weekz all i wanna do is eat. I weighted. 200 before. I got pregnant

Babies don't usually take more than they need, unless it's a case of gestational diabetes. Your body is likely just storing up some energy for the labor and delivery. Just try to make healthy choices.

question: I'm 34 weeks and I been eating a lot I'm always hungry! Will my daughter be bigger since I've been eating so much? I dont wsnt her to be more than 8 pounds.Has anybody else ate a lot through there pregancies and there baby weighed a lot more than they thought?
title: Scared for a big baby
